summary: This document is a Power of Attorney form for Jeffrey Epstein, appointing Darren Indyke as his agent to manage accounts with Deutsche Bank Securities Inc. It outlines the responsibilities and authorities granted to the agent, including trading and asset management. The document emphasizes the importance of the Principal's understanding of the powers being granted.

persons.name: Darren Indyke
persons.context: Darren Indyke is appointed as the agent and attorney-in-fact for Jeffrey Epstein, with authority over his accounts at Deutsche Bank Securities Inc.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Jeffrey Epstein is the Principal granting power of attorney to Darren Indyke for managing his financial accounts.

persons.name: Fran Wickman

persons.name: Vahe Stepanian
persons.context: Vahe Stepanian is part of the internal communications discussing the onboarding of Jeffrey Epstein as a client.

persons.name: Zbynek Kozelsky
persons.context: Zbynek Kozelsky is involved in the internal communications regarding the Power of Attorney for Jeffrey Epstein.

persons.name: Jean Anne Brennan
persons.context: Jean Anne Brennan is mentioned as an agent appointed by Jeffrey Epstein, with her signature notarized by her assistant.

connections.description: Jeffrey Epstein appoints Darren Indyke as his agent to manage his financial accounts.

The document outlines the responsibilities and powers granted to the agent, including trading and asset management.
There are internal communications regarding the onboarding of Jeffrey Epstein as a client at Deutsche Bank.
